task.title: Purchasing a Sponsor Package
task.abstract: Sponsor Packages are available for purchase by users through the Shopping Cart and the Community Portal.

ul.li: Add package items to a Sponsor Package.

step.cmd: Navigate to the Sales Order tab in the ebusiness application. Click the New button.
Enter a value for the Contact field using the lookup. Click Save.
step.info: It is best practice to select "Receipt" and "Simple Receipt" from the Posting Entity and Schedule Type picklists, respectively.

step.cmd: Search for the Sponsor Package in the Filter Results searchbar and add it to the Shopping Cart.
step.info: If there is a package item related to the Sponsor Package, select the associated tab and click the Add to Cart button.

step.cmd: Click the Checkout button and enter payment information. Click the Pay button.

ul.li: The Sales Order will display a Status of Closed and a Posting Status of Posted.
A Sales Order Line is created for each purchased item along with the package item.
Transaction Summary, Receipt, and ePayment records are automatically created and will display in their respective related lists on the Sales Order record.
A Sponsor record is created in the Sponsors related list on the Event record.
